overview_of_class:
How are education policies developed, implemented and evaluated? To what extent do schools influence opportunity structures and social change? This course explores relationships between education policy, practices and outcomes with special attention given to research methodologies and policy levers for social change.

Class is equivalent to SOC_POL 307: Education Policy and fulfills the requirement for Social Policy students.
name: Special Topics in Social Policy
title: SESP SOC_POL 351-0-20 Special Topics in Social Policy
